titleInfo.title: Scene of night action on December 23, 1814

mods.abstract: Black and white engraving, "Night Action of the Twenty-third of December," shows American infantry marching, cannoneers firing an artillery piece, and a commander (probably General Andrew Jackson) on horseback. Decorative border includes a flag and musket resting on a cannon. Border is topped with an American eagle perched upon two flags. From John Frost and W. Croome, Pictorial Life of Andrew Jackson.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
